SELECT watermeter.smart_watermeter_id watermeter_id, gateway.smart_gateway_id AS gateway_id, va.`name` apartmentName, cau.username authUserName, va.address houseAddress, vr.`name` roomNo, vrc.customer_name customerName, vrc.customer_phone customerPhone, watermeter.uuid deviceName, watermeter.onoff_status communicationStatus, (watermeter.last_amount - watermeter.meter_amount) amount, gateway.uuid, '0' `type` FROM watermeter left join vr on watermeter.room_id=vr.id LEFT JOIN va on vr.apartment_id=va.id LEFT JOIN vrc on vrc.room_id=vr.id LEFT JOIN varea on va.area=varea.id LEFT JOIN cau on vrc.created_by = cau.id LEFT JOIN gateway_bind ON gateway_bind.smart_id=watermeter.smart_watermeter_id LEFT JOIN gateway ON gateway.smart_gateway_id=gateway_bind.smart_gateway_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND (va.is_delete != '1' or va.is_delete is null) AND (vr.is_delete != '1' or vr.is_delete is null) AND (vrc.is_delete != '1' or vrc.is_delete is null) AND watermeter.house_catalog = 2
AND va.`name` LIKE '%${apartmentName}%'
AND watermeter.uuid LIKE '%${deviceName}%'
AND vrc.customer_name LIKE '%${customerName}%'
AND vrc.customer_phone LIKE '%${customerPhone}%'
AND va.city LIKE '%${cityName}%'
AND va.district LIKE '%${districtName}%'
AND va.area LIKE '%${areaName}%'
AND watermeter.onoff_status LIKE '%${communicationStatus}%'
AND cau.username LIKE '%${authUserName}%'

SELECT watermeter.smart_watermeter_id watermeterId, gateway.smart_gateway_id AS gateway_id, va.area apartmentName, cau.username authUserName, va.address houseAddress, vr.`name` roomNo, vrc.customer_name customerName, vrc.customer_phone customerPhone, watermeter.uuid deviceName, watermeter.onoff_status communicationStatus, (watermeter.last_amount - watermeter.meter_amount) amount, gateway.uuid, '1' `type` FROM watermeter left join vr on watermeter.room_id=vr.id LEFT JOIN va on vr.house_id=va.id LEFT JOIN vrc on vrc.room_id=vr.id LEFT JOIN varea on va.area=varea.id LEFT JOIN cau on watermeter.created_by = cau.id LEFT JOIN gateway_bind ON gateway_bind.smart_id=watermeter.smart_watermeter_id LEFT JOIN gateway ON gateway.smart_gateway_id=gateway_bind.smart_gateway_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND (va.is_delete != '1' or va.is_delete is null) AND (vr.is_delete != '1' or vr.is_delete is null) AND (vrc.is_delete != '1' or vrc.is_delete is null) AND watermeter.house_catalog = 1
AND va.`area` LIKE '%${apartmentName}%'
AND watermeter.uuid LIKE '%${deviceName}%'
AND vrc.customer_name LIKE '%${customerName}%'
AND vrc.customer_phone LIKE '%${customerPhone}%'
AND va.city LIKE '%${cityName}%'
AND va.district LIKE '%${districtName}%'
AND va.area LIKE '%${areaName}%'
AND watermeter.onoff_status LIKE '%${communicationStatus}%'
AND cau.username LIKE '%${authUserName}%'

SELECT w.uuid,CONCAT(h.area,h.building_num,unit_num) AS home_name,h.floor_num AS floor_name,h.house_num AS room_name,w.meter_type,w.created_at,w.meter_updated_at,(w.last_amount-w.meter_amount) AS amount,w.onoff_status,g.uuid AS gateway_uuid FROM AS w INNER JOIN AS gb ON w.smart_watermeter_id = gb.smart_id INNER JOIN AS g ON g.smart_gateway_id=gb.smart_gateway_id INNER JOIN AS h ON w.house_id= h.id INNER JOIN AS r ON w.room_id= r.id AND h.id=r.house_id WHERE w.uuid=#{uuid}

SELECT w.uuid, a.`name` AS house_name, f.`name` AS floor_name, r.`name` AS room_name, w.meter_type, w.created_at, w.meter_updated_at, w.last_amount, w.meter_amount, w.onoff_status, g.uuid AS gateway_uuid FROM AS w Left JOIN AS gb ON w.smart_watermeter_id = gb.smart_id Left JOIN AS g ON g.smart_gateway_id = gb.smart_gateway_id Left JOIN AS a ON w.apartment_id = a.id Left JOIN AS f ON w.floor_id=f.id Left JOIN AS r ON w.room_id=r.id AND a.id = r.apartment_id WHERE w.uuid=#{uuid}
SELECT wr.created_at, wr.device_amount, wr.smart_watermeter_id FROM wr WHERE smart_watermeter_id = #{smartWatermeterId} AND created_at between #{startTime} and #{endTime} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT gateway.smart_gateway_id smartGatewayId, house.area apartmentName, auth_user.username authUserName, house.address houseAddress, room.`name` roomNo, gateway.operator, gateway.uuid, gateway.onoff_status communicationStatus, gateway.updated_at , gateway.install_time, '1' `type` FROM AS gateway LEFT JOIN room ON gateway.room_id = room.id LEFT JOIN house ON gateway.house_id = house.id LEFT JOIN room_contract ON room_contract.room_id = room.id LEFT JOIN auth_user ON auth_user.id = gateway.created_by WHERE 1 = 1 AND gateway.house_catalog = 1 AND (house.is_delete != '1' or house.is_delete is null) AND (room.is_delete != '1' or room.is_delete is null) AND (room_contract.is_delete != '1' or room_contract.is_delete is null)
AND house.`name` LIKE '%${apartmentName}%'
AND gateway.uuid LIKE '%${gatewayUuid}%'
AND house.city LIKE '%${cityName}%'
AND house.district LIKE '%${districtName}%'
AND house.area LIKE '%${areaName}%'
AND cau.username LIKE '%${authUserName}%'
AND gateway.onoff_status LIKE '%${communicationStatus}%'

SELECT gateway.smart_gateway_id smartGatewayId, apartment.`name` apartmentName, auth_user.username authUserName, apartment.address houseAddress, room.`name` roomNo, gateway.operator, gateway.uuid, gateway.onoff_status communicationStatus, gateway.updated_at, gateway.install_time, '0' `type` FROM AS gateway LEFT JOIN room ON gateway.room_id = room.id LEFT JOIN apartment ON gateway.apartment_id = apartment.id LEFT JOIN room_contract ON room_contract.room_id = room.id LEFT JOIN auth_user ON auth_user.id = gateway.created_by WHERE 1 = 1 AND gateway.house_catalog = 2 AND (apartment.is_delete != '1' or apartment.is_delete is null) AND (room.is_delete != '1' or room.is_delete is null) AND (room_contract.is_delete != '1' or room_contract.is_delete is null)
AND house.`area` LIKE '%${apartmentName}%'
AND gateway.uuid LIKE '%${gatewayUuid}%'
AND house.city LIKE '%${cityName}%'
AND house.district LIKE '%${districtName}%'
AND house.area LIKE '%${areaName}%'
AND cau.username LIKE '%${authUserName}%'
AND gateway.onoff_status LIKE '%${communicationStatus}%'

SELECT gateway.uuid,apartment.address AS install_adress,gateway.onoff_status,gateway.updated_at,gateway.created_at,gateway.brand FROM AS gateway LEFT JOIN AS house ON gateway.house_id = house.id WHERE gateway.smart_gateway_id=#{gatewayId}

SELECT gateway.uuid,apartment.address AS install_adress,gateway.onoff_status,gateway.updated_at,gateway.created_at,gateway.brand FROM AS gateway LEFT JOIN AS apartment ON gateway.apartment_id = apartment.id WHERE gateway.smart_gateway_id=#{gatewayId}

SELECT watermeter.uuid AS watermeter_uuid,room. NAME AS room_name FROM AS watermeter LEFT JOIN AS gaterway_bind ON watermeter.smart_watermeter_id = gaterway_bind.smart_id LEFT JOIN AS room ON room.id = watermeter.room_id WHERE gaterway_bind.smart_gateway_id = #{gatewayId}

SELECT watermeter.uuid AS watermeter_uuid,room. NAME AS room_name FROM AS watermeter LEFT JOIN AS gaterway_bind ON watermeter.smart_watermeter_id = gaterway_bind.smart_id LEFT JOIN AS room ON room.id = watermeter.room_id WHERE gaterway_bind.smart_gateway_id = #{gatewayId}

SELECT house.id AS home_id, house.area AS home_Name, house.synchronous, '1' `type` FROM house LEFT JOIN AS auth_user ON house.created_by_id = auth_user.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( house.is_delete != '1' OR house.is_delete IS NULL )
AND house.`area` LIKE '%${homeName}%'
AND house.city LIKE '%${cityName}%'
AND house.district LIKE '%${districtName}%'
AND house.area LIKE '%${areaName}%'
AND auth_user.username LIKE '%${authUserName}%'

SELECT apartment.id AS home_id, apartment.name AS home_Name, apartment.synchronous, '0' `type` FROM apartment LEFT JOIN AS auth_user ON apartment.created_by= auth_user.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( apartment.is_delete != '1' OR apartment.is_delete IS NULL )
AND apartment.`name` LIKE '%${homeName}%'
AND apartment.city LIKE '%${cityName}%'
AND apartment.district LIKE '%${districtName}%'
AND apartment.area LIKE '%${areaName}%'
AND auth_user.username LIKE '%${authUserName}%'

SELECT room.id, room.`name`,room.house_id,room.synchronous FROM AS room WHERE room.house_id = #{homeId}
AND ( synchronous=0 OR synchronous IS NULL )
AND synchronous = 1
limit 1

SELECT room.id, room.`name`,room.apartment_id,room.synchronous FROM AS room WHERE room.apartment_id = #{homeId}
AND ( synchronous=0 OR synchronous IS NULL )
AND synchronous = 1
limit 1
